Name: Cognitive Engagement through Reminders
Description: Elena utilizes the ALFRED platform to set daily reminders for cognitive exercises, such as puzzles and memory games, which she can access easily through voice commands. The system personalizes these reminders based on her preferences and cognitive abilities to ensure they are engaging yet not overwhelming. Thomas, on the other hand, receives gentle nudges from ALFRED for similar activities, but with an option to customize the frequency and type of reminders to maintain his sense of autonomy. Both users can track their progress over time, fostering a positive reinforcement loop that encourages continued engagement without feeling monitored.
